front.title: Authorization for NSIS Signaling Layer Protocols

abstract.t: Signaling layer protocols in the NSIS working group may rely on GISTto handle authorization. Still, the signaling layer protocol itselfmay require separate authorization to be performed when a nodereceives a request for a certain kind of service or resources. Thisdraft presents a generic model and object formats for sessionauthorization within the NSIS Signaling Layer Protocols. The goal ofsession authorization is to allow the exchange of information betweennetwork elements in order to authorize the use of resources for aservice and to coordinate actions between the signaling and transportplanes.
